news.title: Google’s AI try-on feature for clothes now works with just a selfie
news.summary: In the past, users had to upload a full-body picture of themselves to virtually try on a piece of clothing. Now, they can use a selfie and Nano Banana will generate a full body digital version of them.

news.title: OpenAI fires back at Google with GPT-5.2 after ‘code red’ memo
news.summary: OpenAI just launched GPT-5.2, a frontier model aimed at developers and professionals, pushing reasoning and coding benchmarks as it races Google’s Gemini 3 while grappling with compute costs and no generator.

news.title: Google debuts ‘Disco,’ a Gemini-powered tool for making web apps from browser tabs
news.summary: Google Labs is testing a product that will work with your browser tabs to make web apps for you.

news.title: Rivian’s AI assistant is coming to its EVs in early 2026
news.summary: And when it does, the AI assistant will roll out to every existing EV in its lineup, not just the next-generation versions of its R1T truck and R1S SUV.

news.title: Rivian goes big on autonomy, with custom silicon, lidar, and a hint at robotaxis
news.summary: CEO RJ Scaringe laid out his plan for how Rivian's vehicles will increasingly drive themselves, in a bid to match or exceed the capabilities of rival automakers and AV companies.

news.title: Google is building an experimental new browser and a new kind of web app
news.summary: The Chrome team at Google recently built a new browser. It takes a query or prompt, opens a bunch of related tabs for you, and then builds you a custom app for whatever you're trying to do. Ask it for travel tips and it'll build you a planner app; ask it for study help and […]

news.title: ChatGPT’s ‘adult mode’ is expected to debut in Q1 2026
news.summary: We've seen NSFW offerings from Grok and other chatbots, and OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has been teasing adult content within ChatGPT for a while. Now, we have a timeline. news.title: Comcast cable boxes are getting Amazon Luna cloud gaming
news.summary: Amazon's Luna cloud gaming service is coming to cable boxes from Comcast and Rogers. The Luna app is already available via web browsers, Fire TV devices, Fire tablets, and many smart TVs from Samsung and LG, and this new expansion will bring the service to "millions" more devices, according to Amazo

news.title: GPT-5.2 is OpenAI’s latest move in the agentic AI battle
news.summary: GPT-5.2 is here, and with it, OpenAI wants "to unlock even more economic value for people," Fidji Simo, the company's CEO of Applications, told reporters in a Thursday briefing. She said it's been in the works for "many, many months." The company calls GPT-5.2 its "best model yet for everyday profes

news.title: Mamoru Hosoda explains why Hamlet is everywhere this year
news.summary: Hamlet is having something of a renaissance in 2025. This year's edition of the Toronto International Film Festival featured three different takes on the idea, including Chloé Zhao's adaptation of the play's inspiration and Aneil Karia's rendition set in modern-day London. news.title: Show HN: GPULlama3.java Llama Compilied to PTX/OpenCL Now Integrated in Quarkus
news.summary:
wget https://github.com/beehive-lab/TornadoVM/releases/download/v...
unzip tornadovm-2.1.0-opencl-linux-amd64.zip
# Replace  manually with the absolute path of the extracted folder
export TORNADO_SDK="/tornadovm-2.1.0-opencl"
export PATH=$TORNADO_SDK/bin:$PATHtornado --devices
tornado --version# Nav

news.title: Oracle shares slide on $15B increase in data center spending
news.summary: Company raises its capital expenditure forecast as it doubles down on AI infrastructure bet.

news.title: NASA just lost contact with a Mars orbiter, and will soon lose another one
news.summary: If NASA is serious about exploring Mars, it's past time to send new missions.

news.title: After years of resisting it, SpaceX now plans to go public. Why?
news.summary: "Much of the AI race comes down to amassing and deploying assets."

news.title: After NPR and PBS defunding, FCC receives call to take away station licenses
news.summary: NPR and PBS stations targeted by group involved in Carr's news-distortion probes.

news.title: A new open-weights AI coding model is closing in on proprietary options
news.summary: Devstral 2 model scores 72% on industry benchmark, nearing proprietary rivals.

news.title: How Taiwan Made Cashless Payments Cute
news.summary: Taiwan’s digital payment infrastructure is tactile, decentralized, and completely distinct from China’s QR code-dominated model.

news.title: OpenAI Launches GPT-5.2 as It Navigates ‘Code Red’
news.summary: The ChatGPT-maker is releasing its “best model yet” as it faces new pressures from Google and other AI competitors.

news.title: The Disney-OpenAI Deal Redefines the AI Copyright War
news.summary: Disney is hedging against the future. OpenAI is clearing a path for Sora. And together they’ve made a blueprint for how AI and Hollywood can move forward.

news.title: Cursor Launches an AI Coding Tool For Designers
news.summary: The 300-person startup hopes bringing designers aboard will give it an edge in an increasingly competitive AI software market.

news.title: AT&T’s Connected Life Platform Is a Second Try in the Smart-Home Space
news.summary: The carrier’s Connected Life platform, now available nationwide, lets AT&T customers easily set up a smart-home security system.
